page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content: In our area there are four churches,three in Hathern incorporating three different religions:Baptist,Church of England and Roman Catholic.Both Baptist and Church of England have active Sunday schools catering for village children.Roman Catholics go out of the village for their Sunday school.The Church of England church was built in 700 but now nearly rebuilt due to decay.Historical value due to old font found in church yard,now it is inside the church.Named St.Peter and St.Paul.The Baptist church is over 100 years old.The church in Long Whatton is Church of England.It is fairly old and holds regular services.The Roman Catholic Church has recently been rebuilt because it was falling apart.
